# UITableViewCell.AccessoryType.detailButton

**Case**

An information button.

## Declaration

```swift
case detailButton
```

## Discussion

Choose this option to display a button that, when tapped, displays information about the row. Use your delegate’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableViewDelegate/tableView(_:accessoryButtonTappedForRowWith:)] method to respond to taps in the button.

## Accessory views

- **UITableViewCell.AccessoryType.none**: No accessory view.
- **UITableViewCell.AccessoryType.disclosureIndicator**: A chevron-shaped control for presenting new content.
- **UITableViewCell.AccessoryType.detailDisclosureButton**: An information button and a disclosure (chevron) control.
- **UITableViewCell.AccessoryType.checkmark**: A checkmark image.
